name: vk-telegram-crossposter-glasp
description: Google Apps Script build tools for VK→Telegram Crossposter

scripts.build: npm run build:server && npm run build:client
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run module-check
scripts.module-check: node -e "console.log('Checking module integrity...'); const fs = require('fs'); const serverFiles = fs.readdirSync('../server').filter(f => f.endsWith('.gs')); const clientFiles = fs.readdirSync('../client').filter(f => f.endsWith('.gs')); console.log('Server modules:', serverFiles.length, 'files'); console.log('Client modules:', clientFiles.length, 'files'); if (serverFiles.length === 0 || clientFiles.length === 0) { process.exit(1); } console.log('✓ Module integrity check passed');"

author: f_den
